attributes.action: Parliament has demanded to see The Yellow Hammer document. Publish it forthwith.
attributes.additional_details: MP's have already voted to publish the document. There is no reason for delay. Parliament, the voice of The People has spoken.
attributes.background: The Yellow Hammer document gives/gave details of the consequences  of Brexit on The  British public and public life . Therefore without further  delay, ado or repudiation  The British Government must publish the document for oversight by The British People as instructed by Parliament.
